name: Deadly Arena
description:
Are you ready to enter this crazy but also dangerous arena? 

Fight in this game against bizarre monsters and evil enemies. How long will you survive in this arena?

A top down action game with three different enemies and growing waves.

controlls: W, A, S, D to move; right click to attack

I'm just a beginner at game development but I wanted to make the expirience of uploading a game. I would really appreciate if your would give me feedback to improve myself as a gamedev.

The game was made in the  Godot Engine 

The game and the sounds were made by me.

Also nearly all of the  sprites were made by 0x72 and the font was made by somepx.
